embed: <object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/G-lGCC4KKok?version=3&f=videos&app=youtube_gdata"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/G-lGCC4KKok?version=3&f=videos&app=youtube_gdata" allowscriptaccess="always" height="344" width="425" allowfullscreen="true" type="application/x-shockwave-flash"></embed></object>
summary:
This talk covers scalability at YouTube. It's given by one of the original
engineers at YouTube, Mike Solomon. It's a rare glimpse into the heart of
YouTube which is one of the largest websites in the world, and one of the few
extremely large websites to be written in Python.
title: Scalability at YouTube
